scripts.build: rm -rf build && rollup -c && mkdir -p build/frontend && cp index.js build/index.js && cp thumbnail.png build/thumbnail.png && cp -r frontend/build build/frontend/build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev:rollup" "npm run start:runner" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:rollup" "npm run dev:runner" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:frontend: BROWSER=none PORT=3000 npx lerna run start --scope=@urturn/test-app-frontend
